body.p: Which of the following is the correct order of the layers of heart when going from deep to superficial?

multiple_choice.choice: the epicardium, the myocardium, the endocardium
the endocardium, the epicardium, the myocardium
the myocardium, the epicardium, the endocardium
the endocardium, the myocardium, and the epicardium

feedback.p: Incorrect. The epicardium is the most superficial layer.
Incorrect. The myocardium is the middle of the three layers.
Incorrect. The myocardium is the middle of the three layers.
Correct. The endocardium is the deepest layer, the myocardium is in the middle, and the epicardium is the superficial layer.
